dublin_core.dcvalue: Autism spectrum disorder has become one of the most prevalent developmental disorders A difficulty with communication is one of the main impairments We are developing a digital library of images that will be used to help children with autism communicate without the need for reading or writing skills Images will be displayed on Pocket PCs to convey messages We are currently developing and evaluating the first prototype
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Communication software using pictures for use with Pocket PCs.
